Name: Lazy Man Flip
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Sour or Martini/Coupette glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and grated nutmeg.
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over cocktail and discard.
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: Indulgent creamy mouthfeel but not too sweet, with a great balance between the port and the calvados.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2007 by Chris Jepson at Milk and Honey in London, England. Chris' original recipe also contained 3/4 shot of cream. However, strictly speaking, flips contain egg but not cream.
